name: Firefox 3.x - Winstripe Firefox 1.5 toolbar
description:
Legacy Firefox 1.5 toolbar optimized for Firefox 3, script based on iklaudsch's Winstripe Modernized theme and the awesome supersmall style 11458 by user 6147 for the small icons solution. Or if you want proper sharp small icons install style 16475 (not uploaded here for the file size limit)

Use with style 16406 and style 16441
